summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 13438 entitled, "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue West from a point three hundred (300) feet south of Alva Street to Smith Street; Fourteenth Avenue West from Atlanta Street to Smith Street; Thirteenth Avenue West from Atlanta Street to Gilman Avenue; Atlanta Street from Thirteenth Avenue West to Fifteenth Avenue West; Alva Street from Thirteenth Avenue West to Fifteenth Avenue West; Smith Street from Fifteenth Avenue West to Gilman Avenue; Gilman Avenue from Eleventh Avenue West to Fourteenth Avenue West, and Eleventh Avenue West from Gilman Avenue to Howe Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same in accordance with Resolution No. 875 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by an act of the Legislature of the State of Washington, entitled 'An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency,' approved March 4, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899."
